data.name: 3on3 FreeStyle – Battle Pass Summer Part. 2
data.detailed_description:
Quirkyness is a must in Summer Party! Complete this seasons's Battle pass and get 2 Intensive manuals, 110 Points, 5 Costumes and 2 Octopus hats!

This package includes:
- Battle Pass Ticket x1

**The Battle Pass unlocks Premium missions to make your leveling up faster.
**You can purchase The Battle Pass at any point during Battle Season and will be able to get all the lower level rewards.
**Upon purchase, The Battle Pass goes to your Message box.
**The Battle Pass cannot be refunded after claiming as the Package contains items that cannot be retrieved.
**If purchased, you are advised not to purchase Battle Pass Summer Bundle Part 2 as it contains duplicate item.

data.short_description: Bring fun to Summer Party with Battle Pass summer part 2! Complete this seasons's Battle pass and get 2 Intensive manuals, 110 Points, 5 Costumes and 2 Octopus hats!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Thai, Korean
*languages with full audio support
